title: How to Create Video Scripts with ChatGPT
description: Get video ideas and scripts for job walkthroughs, tips, and social media content.
requirements: Something to share: a recent job, tip, or behind-the-scenes moment

steps.title: Brainstorm video ideas
steps.description: Use ChatGPT to generate content ideas.
substeps: Try: 'Give me 10 short video ideas for a [your trade] business. Make them helpful, interesting, or entertaining. Under 60 seconds each.'
Good categories: Tips, before/after, day-in-the-life, common mistakes
steps.tip: Job walkthrough videos perform great — people love seeing the work.

steps.title: Get a script for your first video
steps.description: Don't wing it — have a plan.
substeps: Pick one idea from your list
Ask ChatGPT: 'Write a 30-second video script for [topic]. I'm a [your trade]. Keep it casual and natural, like I'm talking to a friend.'
Review the script — adjust anything that doesn't sound like you

steps.title: Keep it simple and short
substeps: Start with a hook: 'Here's why your [problem] keeps happening...'
End with a call-to-action: 'Follow for more tips' or 'Call us if you need help'

steps.title: Record with your phone
substeps: Good lighting: Face a window or go outside
Hold phone horizontal or vertical (vertical for social media)
Speak clearly and a bit slower than normal
steps.tip: Multiple short takes are fine. You can combine them in editing.

steps.title: Post and share
substeps: Post to Facebook, Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts
Add captions — many people watch without sound
Post at least 1-2 videos per week for best results

successMessage: You have video ideas and scripts ready! Video gets 3x more engagement than photos.
proTips: Before/after transformations are the easiest viral content
Authenticity beats production quality — don't overthink it
Repurpose: One job video becomes a Reel, YouTube Short, and TikTok
